post:
WHUK a company backed by a decade of Industry experience offers fully managed VPS hosting packages at the best affordable prices. xLite Linux Virtual Machines are based on Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers as the base server infrastructure, offering superior connectivity. This setup ensures optimum performance and offers the flexibility to run large websites and install third party applications with ease. While the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V, it provides with maximum efficiency and uptime of the website.

The VPS hosting platform provided by WHUK is the perfect hosting solution that provides you with complete control over your hosting environment. 24/7 pro-active support and monitoring is offered in order to ensure the uptime and speed of your website. Loaded with the latest technology and enriched with industry leading features; these virtual private servers prove to be the best investment for the website.

In case you have any questions, you can contact our sales department by initiating a chat or by dropping an email to sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on 0800 862 0890 / +44-191-303-8069.
